title: Bizning Maqsadimiz
text: Bizning maqsadimiz - bilimli, ijodiy fikrlovchi va o‘z sohasida muvaffaqiyat qozona oladigan o‘quvchilarni tayyorlashdir. Shu bilan birga, har bir o‘quvchi o‘z qobiliyatlarini rivojlantirishi va ta’lim jarayonida faol ishtirok etishi uchun imkoniyat yaratishdir.

section.title: Why Antd?
section.content: Ant Design is a React UI library that has a lot of easy-to-use components for building elegant UI.

section.title: Why styled-components?
section.content: Styled Components gives you total control over your components.
